title: Langdale's vintage packaging lettering
content:
Hi,

I’m drawing up a logo in Illustrator and would like to achieve something similar to the ’LANGDALE’S’lettering. Does anyone have any suggestions of font’s or logos i could look at for reference??

Thanks a lot

(Sorry for the bad image quality)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629053552im_/http:/typophile.com/files/928c.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Sprint logo - TheSans {Dav}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629053552/http:/typophile.com/node/19504 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Athens Country Club - Monotype Script {Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629053552/http:/typophile.com/node/19500 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Ludwell

comments.content: You might be interested in some of the typefaces found at [Letterhead Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20070629053552/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/).
Great, lot’s to look at. Thanks for your help
